thread.title: Pa. Board Found State Supreme Court Justice's Emails Were 'Mildly Pornographic'
thread.title_full: Pa. Board Found State Supreme Court Justice's Emails Were 'Mildly Pornographic'

author: Karoli
title: Pa. Board Found State Supreme Court Justice's Emails Were 'Mildly Pornographic'
text:
sharethis 10/20/15 9:00am PHILADELPHIA — "Mildly pornographic." No worse than what "appears commonly in Playboy." That was what a Pennsylvania board determined late last year when it cleared state Supreme Court Justice J. Michael Eakin of misconduct — even though he'd received about 50 pornographic emails on state computers. The Judicial Conduct Board, under fire for its role in… emails , J. Michael Eakin , PA Supreme Court , Pornography Comments
